scripts.dev: npm run setup:gl && npm run dev:wasm && vite dev --host
scripts.dev:wasm: cd .. && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && cp target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/WebFlappyBird.wasm frontend/static/
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run setup:gl && vite build
scripts.build:wasm: cd .. && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && mkdir -p frontend/static/assets && cp target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/WebFlappyBird.wasm frontend/static/assets/WebFlappyBird-v1.0.0.wasm
